title: Calories in Kahlua
meta_description: Discover calories in Kahlua per serving, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts for this coffee liqueur, plus serving tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard Kahlua coffee liqueur (20% ABV), one serving = 30 ml (1 fl oz); no mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, batch, and serving size. Alcoholic beverages should be consumed responsibly; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 30 ml serving of Kahlua contains about 91 calories, primarily from carbohydrates and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with bottled products.

tweaks.label: Add 30 ml heavy cream (for a creamy liqueur drink)
Mixed with 30 ml vodka (straight shot combo)

faqs.q: How many calories in one shot of Kahlua?
faqs.a: About 91 calories in 30 ml (1 fl oz) of Kahlua.
Yes, approximately 10.8 g carbs per 30 ml serving, all from sugars.

faqs.q: Does Kahlua have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; it's mostly carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Kahlua compared to other liqueurs?
faqs.a: Kahlua is sweeter and higher in calories (91 kcal/oz) than plain vodka (70 kcal/oz) due to added sugars.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Kahlua?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a double shot (60 ml) would be about 182 kcal.
